title: A Raisin in the Sun flashback

content.question: The flashback in line 9 (“When I . . . face”) to Beneatha’s childhood makes her current disillusionment more poignant by showing the

choices.label: happiness of her carefree early years
idealism and empathy she once possessed
magnitude and persistence of her family’s poverty
origin of her sometimes reckless personality

content.answer: idealism and empathy she once possessed

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
